description:
Keir Starmer has suffered the biggest fall in approval rating after winning an election of any Prime Minister in the modern era – plummeting 49 points from plus-11 to minus-38 – a poll has shown.

The post Starmer Suffers Biggest Fall in Popularity for New PM as Horror Budget Looms appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Starmer Suffers Biggest Fall in Popularity for New PM as Horror Budget Looms

description:
The campaign to save Benin bronzes in the world's museums was unexpectedly boosted in Zurich last week when a descendant of those enslaved by the African kingdom stood up and demanded the bloody truth be acknowledged.

The post The Bloody Truth About Benin Slavery Must be Acknowledged, Demand Descendants of Those Enslaved by the African Kingdom appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Bloody Truth About Benin Slavery Must be Acknowledged, Demand Descendants of Those Enslaved by the African Kingdom

description:
Tommy Robinson was today jailed for 18 months after pleading guilty to contempt of court for repeating libellous allegations in his film Silenced.

The post Tommy Robinson Jailed for 18 Months for Contempt of Court appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Tommy Robinson Jailed for 18 Months for Contempt of Court

description:
An electric bin lorry burst into flames this morning, forcing multiple London roads to close. It comes as the number of e-bike battery fires has risen by 70% in a year across the country.

The post Electric Bin Lorry Bursts into Flames in Central London appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Electric Bin Lorry Bursts into Flames in Central London

description:
No, fossil fuels are not being "subsidised" by the Government, as the Guardian claims, says David Turver. It turns out what they mean is they're not being taxed as much as they think they should be. Tax is not a subsidy.

The post No, Fossil Fuels Are Not Being “Subsidised” appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: No, Fossil Fuels Are Not Being “Subsidised”

description:
An advisor to the Labour Government in Wales has written a 'resource' for Welsh museums hoping to become "anti-racist organisations" defining racism as something only white people can be guilty of.

The post Racism is When White People Hold “Negative Views” of Other Ethnicities, But Not Vice Versa, Claims Senior Labour Adviser appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Racism is When White People Hold “Negative Views” of Other Ethnicities, But Not Vice Versa, Claims Senior Labour Adviser

description:
The evidence that offshore wind farms are responsible for more and more strandings of whales and Dolphins is becoming increasingly hard to ignore, says Chris Morrison, the Daily Sceptic's Environment Editor.

The post Shocking Rise in Whale, Dolphin and Porpoise Strandings as Wind Farms Proliferate Around British Coast appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Shocking Rise in Whale, Dolphin and Porpoise Strandings as Wind Farms Proliferate Around British Coast

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
